head.supplied: Mooranoppin ¶ Aug 20th 1884 ¶ Dear Sir, ¶ ¶ I have never lost sight of your request to send you a specimen of any rare shrub, and have tried to interest my neighbours in the same matter; yesterday [...

div.p: RB M1, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

MS found with a specimen of Codonocarpus cotinifolius (MEL 589672), accompanied by specimen label in M's hand, 'Codonocarpus 100 miles east of York 1884 | R. B. Leake'. MS appears to have been addressed to one of M's assistants but intended for him. Mooranoppin
WA. Aug 20th 1884

I have never lost sight of your request to send you a specimen of any rare shrub, and have tried to interest my neighbours in the same matter; yesterday [...] neighbour's son brought me the specimen I enclose, it is not what Baron von Mueller specially wrote about, but it is very rare in this part and may be of interest to him. Should he require a larger quantity of the shrub I shall be glad to get it and send it to him

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
